author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: implement computeShowDurationRank (green)

Ranks shows by total track duration, aggregating from phish.in track data.
Returns sorted longest-first with show metadata and track count.
All 22 tests now passing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test: add failing tests for computeShowDurationRank (red)

Tests for ranking shows by total track duration:
- aggregates track durations per show, sorts longest first
- handles empty input
2 new failing tests, 20 existing pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: implement getSetBreakdown (green)

Organizes tracks by set name, sorted by position within each set.
Essential for setlist visualization rendering.
All 20 tests now passing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test: add failing tests for getSetBreakdown (red)

Tests for organizing tracks by set name within a show:
- groups by set preserving insertion order, sorts by position
- handles empty input
3 new failing tests, 17 existing pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: implement computeSongFrequency (green)

Counts song play frequency across performances.
Returns sorted by count desc, then alphabetically for tiebreaks.
All 17 tests now passing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test: add failing tests for computeSongFrequency (red)

Tests for counting song play frequency across performances:
- counts occurrences, sorts by count desc then alphabetically
- handles empty input
3 new failing tests, 14 existing pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: implement findBustouts (green)

Finds songs with gaps exceeding a day threshold between performances.
Returns SongGap[] sorted by biggest gap first.
All 14 tests now passing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:
test: add failing tests for findBustouts (red)

Tests for finding songs with gaps exceeding a threshold:
- finds bustouts above threshold, returns empty when none qualify
- sorts by gap descending (biggest bustouts first)
3 new failing tests, 11 existing pass.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson
message:

Aggregates shows + tracks into YearStats with:
show count, unique venues/songs, total duration, states visited.
All 11 tests now passing.

author: Robert Grayson

author: Robert Grayson
message:
feat: implement formatDuration (green)

Converts milliseconds to human-readable duration strings.
- Sub-hour: mm:ss (e.g., 3:00, 1:05)
- Hour+: h:mm:ss (e.g., 1:01:01)
All 5 tests now passing.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>

author: Robert Grayson

Tests for converting milliseconds to human-readable duration strings
(mm:ss and h:mm:ss formats). Function not yet implemented.

author: Robert Grayson
message:
chore: scaffold Vite React-TS project with functional core/imperative shell

Sets up the base project structure:
- Vite + React 19 + TypeScript + Vitest + D3.js
- Functional core (src/core/) for pure data transforms
- Imperative shell (src/shell/) for API, hooks, components
- Path aliases (@core/*, @shell/*) configured
- Test infrastructure with jsdom, testing-library, coverage

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
